705471f-a.title: Brooklyn: Linden Street - Central Avenue
705471f-a.text:
Linden Street,north from Central Ave. The two mansions at the right,
are on land owned by Watson Bowson in 1869. ( In 1842,in Bushwick, he pur-
chased a farm adjoining that of Adrian Suydam, and,after subdividing it into
lots,sold them. He repeated this prooess in land in Flushing ten years laten.
Ne died in 1876).
January 1925.
Eugene L. Armlbruster Cellection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
